default: Choose a dataset from the dropdown and then mouse over any neighborhood to explore.
population: Number of people in Thousands, 2016. Source: American Community Survey
popdensityperacre: Number of people per acre in Thousands, 2016. Source: American Community Survey
percapitaincome: Average income earned per person, 2016. Source: American Community Survey
percentnonwhite: Non-White percent of population, 2016. Source: American Community Survey
percentinpoverty: Percent of population with earnings below the poverty line, 2016. Source: American Community Survey
medianhomevalue: Median home value, 2016. Source: American Community Survey
unemploymentrate: Jobless share of the labor force, 2016. Source: American Community Survey
percapitacriminalarrests: Rate of Criminal Arrests per 1,000 residents, 2018. Source: DataSF Crime Portal
percapitaencampments: Rate of 311 Encampment Reports per 1,000 residents, 2018. Source: DataSF 311 Portal
medianhoursofsummerfog: Average hours of summertime fog and low cloud cover, 1999-2009. Source: Climate Commons
percentinliquefaction: Percent of land area in a Liquefaction or Landslide zone, 2018. Source: DataSF Seismic Hazard Zones
